title: Preview documentation in Quarkiverse extensions

labels.name: area/quarkiverse
labels.description: This issue/PR is part of the Quarkiverse organization

body:
### Description

It would be nice if changes to the documentation in Quarkiverse extensions were previewed in a surge.sh (or similar) when a pull-request is opened in the repository extension. Bonus points if using the same L&F from https://docs.quarkiverse.io	

### Implementation ideas

Create a GitHub Actions workflow that triggers the preview when a PR is opened:

Reference: 

- https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkusio.github.io/blob/develop/.github/workflows/preview.yml
- https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkusio.github.io/blob/develop/.github/workflows/preview-teardown.yml
